title: Thieves' Highway (restored, with intro and outro) (1949, film noir, imdb score: 7.5)

sources.title: Thieves' Highway (restored, with intro and outro) (1949, film noir, imdb score: 7.5)
sources.description: Thieves' Highway is a 1949 American film noir directed by Jules Dassin and starring Richard Conte , Valentina Cortese and Lee J. Cobb . The screenplay was written by A. I. Bezzerides , based on his novel Thieves' Market . The film was released on DVD as part of the Criterion Collection in 2005.
